entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who grunted in pain and was thrown face down onto the ground.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who screamed to leave Ron alone.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who knew the voice and had a turned stomach.

entities.name: fenrir greyback
entities.description: Fenrir Greyback is mentioned as a werewolf and Death Eater who was speaking to Harry.

entities.name: death eater robes
entities.description: Death Eater robes are mentioned as something that Fenrir Greyback wears.

relationships.description: Fenrir Greyback threatens Ron with worse punishment if he's on his list.
Harry recognizes the voice of Fenrir Greyback.
Hermione is concerned about Ron's safety and screams to leave him alone.
Harry is protecting Ron by being present with him during the attack.
